title: Assortment Is Justice!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>It looks like people love the assortment set that we handed out at the QU4RTZ live~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>We worked hard to make the tea blend compatible with any donut, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s a ton of work to make so many, but seeing that people are this happy makes me want to do it again.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Then let’s do it! Let’s make it the QU4RTZ assortment set series!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Agreed~! What kind of assortment should we go for next?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hmm.... What about fruit mochi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waah, that sounds good! What fruits should we put in?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin would like strawberries and bananas~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>How about a red bean paste plus cream one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m looking forward to the prototype. Rina-chan’s board「Excited」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
